pr_title: #19424 A regex pattern is used to extract the task id to support calver notation

timeline.message: #19424 A regex pattern is used to extract the task id to support calver notation

timeline.bodyText:
it is usually a good idea to have the pattern Compile declared static as it is immutable. and therefore thread-safe.
The matcher has to be recreated every time.  So I would  move final Pattern pattern = Pattern.compile("[0-9]+"); to a static constant.
timeline.author: fabrizzio-dotCMS
timeline.diffHunk:

timeline.bodyText: Codacy found an issue: Avoid variables with short names like id
timeline.author: dev-dotcms

timeline.bodyText: Codacy found an issue: JUnit 4 tests that execute tests should use the @Test annotation, JUnit 5 tests should use @Test, @RepeatedTest, @TestFactory, @TestTemplate or @ParameterizedTest
